title: Indian banks' credit losses in credit cards at nearly 6% - Macquarie Capital
description: Default rates in credit cards and unsecured loans are rising, with losses in credit cards nearing 6%. Young millennials are reportedly defaulting without revolving the loan. The RBI has flagged risks in the unsecured segment and taken measures to curb growth. Asset quality concerns also persist in the MFI space.
